item.description: Trailhead: Take I93 north to exit 35,take US3 north,make a right onto US302,park at AMC's Highland Center Parking Lot by the old train station(RR tracks).The group will be hiking the Avalon,A-Z and Willey Range Trails to the summit of Mount Field(4340') and return by the Avalon Trail to the summit of Mount Avalon(3442').Good views of the Pemigewasset Wilderness from Mount Field and the Crawford Notch from Mount Avalon. 5.1 miles round trip,2440' elevation gain,AMC Book time 4.5 hours,6 hours estimated time for our group.Neither Ron or I can be there,this is a safe hike,just stay together.-----Steve-----As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release,hold harmless,and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage,injury,illness and/or death,including those caused by negligence and or other reasons.You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.name: MODERATE HIKE-MOUNTS FIELD AND AVALON
